pages.text: Poppets are used by witches in an array of situations. More information can be found in the 'Poppets' section of this book; this section exists merely to teach aspiring witches how to bind poppets to players.

$(l)Rite of Binding$()$(br2)$(o)Bind a death protection poppet to a player$()$(br2) - Death Protection Poppet$(br) - Echo Shard$(br) - Demonic Blood$(br) - Golden Apple$(br) - Bound Taglock Kit$(br2)Altar power: 5000$(br2)Medium infernal circle$(br)Large otherwhere circle
